error.description: Whether it is an error state. (Deprecated, removed in the next major version, replaced with status='error')
error.description_zh: 是否是错误状态。(废弃，下个大版本移除，使用 status='error' 替代)

hideNotInViewDates.description: The panel hides gray dates that are not in the current time range
hideNotInViewDates.description_zh: 面板隐藏不在当前时间范围的灰色日期

popupVisible.description: Specify whether the pop-up box is on or off.
popupVisible.description_zh: 指定弹框打开或者关闭状态。

shortcutsPlacementLeft.description: The preset range selection is placed on the left side of the panel and is used for scenes with a large number of preset times.
shortcutsPlacementLeft.description_zh: 预设范围选择放在面板左侧，用于大量预设时间的场景。

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure while hidden
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏的时候销毁 DOM 结构

:utcOffset.description: Set the time zone offset, or 0 if UTC time is required.
:utcOffset.description_zh: 设置时区偏移，如果需要 utc 时间则设置为 0。

timezone.description: Set the time zone, if utcOffset is set, the utcOffset will prevail.
timezone.description_zh: 设置时区, 如果设置了 utcOffset，则以 utcOffset 为准。

position.type: top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br
position.description: The position of the pop-up box

size.description: The size of the date picker

:separator.description: The split symbol in the range selector input box
:separator.description_zh: 范围选择器输入框内的分割符号

dayStartOfWeek.description: The first day of the week starts on the day of the week, 0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, and so on.
dayStartOfWeek.description_zh: 每周的第一天开始于周几，0 - 周日，1 - 周一，以此类推。

:defaultPickerValue.description: The date displayed in the default panel

:pickerValue.description: The date displayed by the panel.

:shortcuts.description: Preset time range for quick selection
:shortcuts.description_zh: 预设时间范围快捷选择

:triggerProps.description: You can pass in the parameters of the Trigger component.
:triggerProps.description_zh: 可以传入 Trigger 组件的参数。

:dateRender.description: Customize the contents of the date cell.
:dateRender.description_zh: 自定义日期单元格的内容。

:getPopupContainer.description: The parent node of the pop-up box

events.name: onChange
events.description: A callback when the value of the calendar component changes
events.description_zh: 日历组件值发生改变时的回调

events.name: onClear
events.description: Callback after clicking the Clear button
events.description_zh: 点击清除按钮后的回调

events.name: onOk
events.description: Click the callback of the Confirm button

events.name: onSelect
events.description: Select a callback when the date has changed but the component value has not changed
events.description_zh: 选中日期发生改变但组件值未改变时的回调

events.name: onSelectShortcut
events.description: Click the callback when you select a shortcut.
events.description_zh: 点击快捷选择时的回调。

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Callbacks when turned on or off
